title: In-Depth Science and Mathematics Concept Education: Video Disc-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science and mathematics theories and basic statistical analysis skills
context.additional_context: An experiment-based learning environment using video disc simulation tools compatible with smartphones, emphasizing concretization of abstract concepts through visual materials

learning_goals: Perform correlation analysis between variables with over 80% accuracy using scientific experiment data visualization tools
Develop at least three real-life problem-solving cases by applying mathematical modeling techniques presented in video disk simulations
Construct argumentation structures based on visual materials and complete peer feedback exchanges at least twice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
